alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Chicot and southeastern Ashley Counties, Morehouse, East Carroll, Richland and West Carroll Parishes, southern Sunflower, southern Washington, northwestern Yazoo, northwestern Issaquena, Humphreys and Sharkey Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1106 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line roughly from Bastrop, Louisiana to Indianola, Mississppi. These storms were moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bastrop around 1110 PM CDT. Belzoni around 1135 PM CDT. Rayville and Start around 1140 PM CDT. Alto around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Perryville, Collinston, Eden, Louise, Epps, Mayersville, Silver City, Arcola, Mer Rouge and Pioneer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
